messages.title: Who I am What I stand for
messages.content: I didn't ever set out to be a politician! At the age of 22, I wanted to be a priest but I was living on one of the roughest council estates in Scotland when the Conservatives decided to get rid of 176,000 houses. They just didn't bother to tell the residents and one day we opened the evening paper to find our own home was up for sale! That made me angry and I decided to get more engaged in politics.

leaflet.personalStatement: I didn't ever set out to be a politician! At the age of 22, I wanted to be a priest but I was living on one of the roughest council estates in Scotland when the Conservatives decided to get rid of 176,000 houses. They just didn't bother to tell the residents and one day we opened the evening paper to find our own home was up for sale! That made me angry and I decided to get more engaged in politics.

endorsements.endorsement: I trust Barry. He's not flashy, but he's very clever and you just sense he can see things in perspective and get them done.
I'm voting for Barry because not only did he help me with a personal issue when I met him, but also because he has a coherent vision of our country's economy.

The few times Barry sent his children 'challenging' text messages, he said he wrote each text as if it would be published on the front page of the next day's newspaper. That's how much he cares about being honest.
When my family came to the UK 15 years ago, it was Barry who helped me settle and find a job. Personally welcoming refugees and immigrants shows his character and his depth of humanity.
I'm an old member of the Labour Party. I've been in the Labour Movement for more than 50 years. Barry has done a fantastic job as MP for our community and I strongly support him.
Barry is always on top of any health issues I've ever had. He's so supportive and he's with you every step of the way.
Barry understands business - he's not just dependent on party loyalties. He ran his own business for 9 years before going into politics.
I've worked closely with Barry and his passion for young people and education is unmatched.
Barry's promise of Free School Meals is great. It'll ensure all our kids get at least one healthy meal a day. I've seen his work in Brent, it'll definitely help us.

examples: At the age of 22, I wanted to be a priest but I was living on one of the roughest council estates in Scotland when the Conservatives decided to get rid of 176,000 houses.
Personally welcoming refugees and immigrants shows his character and his depth of humanity.
I've seen his work in Brent, it'll definitely help us.
I've worked closely with Barry and his passion for young people and education is unmatched.
